free.aiAgentConversations: Your first 50 conversations are free (lifetime). You can upgrade your monthly limit to 50 - 1k.
free.lyroProductRecommendation: Available with the purchase of a paid Lyro AI Agent quota (50-1k conversations).
free.visitorsReachedViaFlows: Your first 100 visitors reached via Flows are free. You can upgrade your monthly limit to 2k - 100k.
